name: felv
description: Fast easy and light JavaScript validator.
author: Thomas Prelot <tprelot@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Gnucki)

scripts.check: gnodi-lint && npm run test-coverage && npm run test-integration
scripts.test-coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter text-summary
scripts.test-coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.test-watch: NODE_ENV='test' mocha -w -b --recursive test/unit/ test/integration/ test/fixtures/ index.js
